articles.title: College basketball rankings: Michigan State drops out of top five after loss to Northwestern - CBS Sports
articles.description: The Spartans tumbled in the Top 25 And 1 rankings after what Tom Izzo called 'one of the more inept performances of my 26 years'
articles.content: Michigan State won each of its first six games of the season, four of them by double-digits. The Spartans beat the Notre Dame team that beat Kentucky at Kentucky. They beat Duke at Duke. On a surface… [+1927 chars]
